synopsis.text: Humans have transformed Venus into a habitable planet in the 21st century, but peace remains elusive as two rival nations, Aphrodia and Ishtar, engage in a bitter war. Amidst this chaos, Hiro Seno, a skilled motorcycle racer, finds himself on the frontlines of the conflict after witnessing Ishtar's devastating attack on Aphrodia's capital. Along with his Battle Bike team, Hiro must navigate the perils of war and use their unique racing skills to fight back against the oppressive Ishtar forces. As the war escalates and resources dwindle, reporter Susan Sommers becomes entangled in the struggle, joining Hiro and his team on a dangerous journey to reclaim their homeland. This dark and gritty tale explores the harsh realities of war and the resilience of a group of teenagers determined to survive against all odds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
